message.raw:
add path to OGRE's FindOGRE.cmake for non-Debian systems

Debian moves the cmake files provided by OGRE to /usr/share/OGRE/cmake/modules,
but the project itself installs them to /usr/lib/OGRE/cmake.
As gazebo only considered the first one, `find_package(Gazebo)` failed
on systems like Lunar-Linux or Arch-Linux.

message:

Debian moves the cmake files provided by OGRE to /usr/share/OGRE/cmake/modules,
but the project itself installs them to /usr/lib/OGRE/cmake.
As gazebo only considered the first one, `find_package(Gazebo)` failed
